component.name: getMessages
component.description: All public messages in the user’s Yammer network

component.name: getMyFeed
component.description: The user’s feed, based on the selection they have made between “Following” and “Top” conversations

component.name: getAlgorithmicFeed
component.description: The algorithmic feed for the user that corresponds to (Top) conversations, which is what the vast majority of users will see in the Yammer web interface

component.name: getFollowing
component.description: The (Following) feed which is conversations involving people, groups and topics that the user is following

component.name: getSentMessages
component.description: All messages sent by the user

component.name: getPrivateMessages
component.description: Private messages received by the user.

component.name: getReceivedMessages
component.description: All messages received by the user.

component.name: postNewMessage
component.description: Create a new message. This allows your app to immediately display the newly-posted message back to the user.

component.name: deleteMessage
component.description: Remove a message. The message must be owned by the current user.

component.name: postLike
component.description: Marks the specified message as liked by the current user.

component.name: removeLike
component.description: Removes the like mark from the specified message.
